name: Envoy
description: Masters of social situations, Envoys use their charm and skills to influence others and bolster allies.

name: Mechanic
description: Experts in technology, Mechanics use their knowledge to control drones and hack systems.

name: Mystic
description: Mystics draw on connections to a mysterious force to cast spells and heal allies.

name: Operative
description: Stealthy and dexterous, Operatives excel at infiltration, reconnaissance, and precision attacks.

name: Solarian
description: Solarians harness the power of stars, channeling solar energy into weapons and armor.

name: Soldier
description: Masters of combat, Soldiers are trained in a wide array of weapons and tactics.

name: Technomancer
description: Technomancers blend magic and technology, casting spells that manipulate both.

name: Vanguard
description: Vanguards use entropy to protect allies and dismantle foes, excelling in close combat.

name: Witchwarper
description: Witchwarpers manipulate alternate realities, altering the battlefield to their advantage.
